meanings.definition: A person who owns or is involved in the management of an industry.
meanings.sent1: The industrialists oversaw the factories and made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The industrialists invested in new technologies to improve production.
meanings.sent3: The industrialists held a meeting to discuss which color to paint the factory.
meanings.sent4: The industrialists were the captains of the industrial ship, steering it towards success.
meanings.sent5: The image of the industrialists in their suits and hard hats became iconic.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are involved in the development and production of goods.
meanings.sent1: The industrialists worked together to create innovative products for the market.
meanings.sent2: The industrialists formed a union to negotiate better working conditions.
meanings.sent3: The industrialists decided to have a friendly competition to see who could make the most toys.
meanings.sent4: The industrialists were like a well-oiled machine, each playing a crucial role in the production process.
meanings.sent5: The industrialists' dedication to quality made their products stand out in the market.
